workflow.name: AI-powered Smart Greenhouse Climate Control Optimization
workflow.description: An automated workflow to optimize greenhouse climate conditions using AI for enhanced plant growth and resource efficiency.

steps.name: Data Collection
steps.description: Gather real-time environmental data from sensors inside the greenhouse.

steps.name: Data Preprocessing
steps.description: Clean and normalize the collected sensor data for analysis.

steps.name: AI Model Prediction
steps.description: Use a trained AI model to predict optimal climate settings based on processed data.
actions: Generate optimal temperature, humidity, CO2, and light levels

steps.name: Climate Control Adjustment
steps.description: Automatically adjust climate control systems based on AI predictions.
actions: Adjust heaters, coolers, humidifiers, CO2 injectors, and lighting

steps.name: Monitoring and Feedback
steps.description: Continuously monitor changes and provide feedback to AI for model refinement.
actions: Send feedback data for AI retraining

onError.message: Error occurred during climate control workflow execution.
